author: cms-sw
body:
As discussed with @civanch @bsunanda 
- cleanup unused configuration variables [a]
- `GEANT4_USE_USOLIDS=CONS;POLYCONE;POLYHEDRA` did not show any real advantage so set it back to `all`

[a]
```
  Manually-specified variables were not used by the project:

    CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_CXX_FLAGS
    CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_C_FLAGS
    GEANT4_USE_USOLIDS-ADVANCED
```
title: Geant4: cleanup unused variables and use GEANT4_USE_USOLIDS="all"
